reviewText: Excellent. It's like having a teacher with you without time constraints
Is there anything better than a great master putting all his knowledge and teaching skills in a DVD and make it available for people like us outside India? True gem. Best $$$ spent.

Being in South Africa has made it extremely difficult to get mirdhangam tuition. This set of DVDs is perfect for me to try to teach myself....It's like having Your teacher/master/guru in your home at Your own convenience.  I'm very happy with my purchase.
